title: Drowned Silence
description: Living in a home dripping with silent tension, lonely teen Dylan finds refuge at schoolâ€”until Kelsey is assigned to be his class project partner. Kelsey, the school outcast, is allergic to water, dresses in Gothic Lolita fashion and refuses to use technology from past the 19th century, which makes working together difficult to say the least.Invited to Kelsey's house during her sister's Halloween party, Dylan uncovers a frightening connection between Kelsey and a death that took place on her property years before.A serialized YA contemporary horror short story from the author of The Never Veil Series and Fall Far from the Tree. Includes bonus short stories Five Bucks, Ego Cafe and All the Living and the Dead.
author: Amy McNulty
